allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Task 1: Create solution and project structure

- Initialize .NET 8 solution with RightClickPS.sln
- Create console app project \(src/RightClickPS\) targeting net8.0-windows
- Create xUnit test project \(tests/RightClickPS.Tests\) targeting net8.0-windows
- Add project reference from test project to main project
- Create folder structure: Commands, Config, Scripts, Registry in both projects
- Add .gitignore for .NET projects
- Add SolutionStructureTests.cs to verify project references work

Completes: Task 1
Dependencies: None

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\ai\\right-click-ps" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Task 13: Implement Program entry point

- Created Program.cs with Main method as CLI entry point
- Routes commands to RegisterCommand, UnregisterCommand, ExecuteCommand
- Supports help command with -h, --help, /? variants
- Case-insensitive command parsing
- Shows usage info when no arguments provided
- Returns appropriate exit codes \(0 success, 1 error, -1 validation error\)
- Added ProgramTests.cs with 17 unit tests for command routing

Completes: Task 13
Dependencies: Tasks 10, 11, 12

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\ai\\right-click-ps" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Task 14: Create Refresh Menus system script

- Created Refresh Menus.ps1 in SystemScripts/_System
- Script invokes RightClickPS.exe register to refresh context menu
- Displays success/error MessageBox to user
- Follows same pattern as other system scripts
- Metadata: @Name: Refresh Menus, @TargetType: Both, @RunAsAdmin: false

Completes: Task 14
Dependencies: Task 13

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C 'D:\\ai\\right-click-ps' commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Task 19: Manual integration testing

- Verified help command displays usage information correctly
- Verified register command discovers scripts and creates registry entries
  - Found 5 scripts in 3 folders
  - Registered 9 total menu items \(5 for files, 4 for directories\)
- Verified unregister command removes all registry entries
- Verified execute command with non-existent script returns proper error
- Verified unknown command shows help and returns error code

All CLI commands function as expected.

Completes: Task 19
Dependencies: Tasks 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
